segments.text: In this kitchen drawing, the woman's attention is all on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the faucet's on and the sink is overflowing badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring out like a waterfall onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe is wet already, and she doesn't notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, kids are raiding the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on a stool that's clearly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies with one hand, plate in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister reaches up, excited for hers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky while mom's distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mess from the water is spreading fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the stool creaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the window frames a pretty garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how hazards hide in plain sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
